trends: There has been one other sighting in Bedford
There were no other sightings in Bedford on or around April 3rd 2008
Summary: Black to smokey gray equilateral triangle with symmetircal 5 green lights (close to color of traffic signal green)
divs: sighting detailsi was in my car traveling on rt. 172 headed east may be 1\4-1\2 mile before the i-684 on-ramp. going about 30-40mph. it was anywhere from 7:30pm-8:00pm et. there was still visible light in the sky as nightfall had not completely set in. i remember how pretty the sky looked with a touch of red against the approaching darkness. i noticed a very large object out of the passenger side of my windshield and then through the passenger window as i continued to travel but at a slower speed. it was big enough to be obvious to the causal observer who would glance up. since i was traveling east on 172 the object was south-south east of me. it was very large, black to smokey-grey and was hovering. there was no visible noise, but my windows were closed so i can't be totally sure. it was a triangle and appeared equilateral in nature. there were 5 bright solid lights on the underbelly - all green (like a traffic signal). three were at the corners of the triangle and two more at the midpoint of two side. i did not see a light at the mid-point of the side of the triangle furthest from me (not sure if it was blocked from me or just that it wasn't there). i have no numerical idea of altitude, but it was well below other aircraft in the area. if i had to guess i would say it occupied 20-30% of my field of vision from my vantage point my initial reaction was what the heck was that and i wanted to get another look. there were other aircraft in the area at higher altitudes - they appeared as specks with lights blinking or solid. the object was in my line of sight for maybe 10-15 seconds before i lost it in the tree line as i continued to travel east on 1rt. 172. i immediately pulled over to the right shoulder and got out of my car maybe 100-200 yds down the road where it was safe to pull over. the tree line obstructed my view to the south-southwest. i quickly got back in my car, turned around and headed west on rt. 172. i pulled into the next street off of rt. 172 i could find and got out of my car. i could no longer see the object in the sky. i looked everywhere and it seemed to have vanished. i heard no noise to indicate such a large object was in fact moving as i would have expected. i immediately went home and told my parents. i returned to the vicinity of the sighting with a camera around 8:30-8:45pm but saw nothing. later that night i stopped by the bedford police department and called westchester county airport to report what i saw.
